short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will make a radar analyze.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows in real time the talking time of the participants of a meeting (by person & by group). It is conceived as a nudge for a better balanced talking time between the participants, which is the number 1 factor of productivity in a group meeting.
